data.name: stacked
data.description: Determines if the buttons are stacked vertically.

data.name: outline
data.description: Applies an outlined style to the button group.

data.name: size
data.description: Specifies the size of the buttons in the group.

data.name: square
data.description: Determines if the buttons in the group are square.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Controls the rounded corners of the buttons in the group.

data.name: variant
data.description: Defines the visual style of the button group, either with borders between buttons or flat with no borders.

data.name: color
data.description: Defines the color scheme of the button group.

data.name: theme
data.description: Sets the overall theme of the button group, affecting colors and styles.

data.name: animate
data.description: Controls the animation speed for the button group.

data.name: ariaLabel
data.description: Custom ARIA label for accessibility, describing the button group.
